com.revature.Services

Interface RegUser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegisterUser

    public interface RegUser
    A user account registration service

    The RegUser interface provides methods for registering both employees and customers.

    Author:
    josecanela

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerCustomer(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a Customer object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC - hence, registering a customer user.
      void registerEmployee(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Creates an Employee object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC - hence, registering an employee user.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCustomer

        void registerCustomer(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Creates a Customer object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC - hence, registering a customer user.
        Parameters:
        username - a customer's username
        password - a customer's username

      • registerEmployee

        void registerEmployee(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Creates an Employee object and inserts it's information into the RDS database utilizing JDBC - hence, registering an employee user.
        Parameters:
        username - an employee's username
        password - an employee's username
